plugins.name: African Name Generator
plugins.description:
African Name Generator Plugin


What It Does

The African Name Generator plugin helps you quickly add authentic African names to your designs. You can generate and insert first names, last names, or full names from Nigeria, Kenya, Ghana, South Africa, and Ethiopia.


How to Use It

1. Open the Plugin: Find and launch the African Name Generator plugin in your Figma plugins menu.

2. Select Parameters:

- Country: Choose Nigeria, Kenya, Ghana, South Africa, Ethiopia, Egypt, Senegal, Uganda, Tanzania, Morocco, and Cameroon.

- Gender: Pick male or female.

- Name Type: Select first name, last name, or full name.

3. Generate Name: Click the "Generate Name" button. The name will appear in the plugin.

4. Insert Name:

- Select a text layer in your Figma file.

- Click the "Insert Name" button. The plugin will insert the name into the selected text layer.


Limitations

- Name List: The names come from a fixed list. Not every African name is included.

- Font Support: The plugin uses fonts available in Figma. Ensure the desired font is available.

- Single Text Layer: Insert names into one text layer at a time. Repeat the process for multiple layers.


The African Name Generator plugin allows you to easily add real African names to your designs.

accepted.name: Joseph Kalu
accepted.description: I am a fintech and crypto product designer

plugins.tagline: Generate Unique African Names for your designs

plugins.name: text2design
plugins.description:
Create beautiful card designs effortlessly with the String to Card Generator plugin for Figma! Select a card template, input a list of strings, and let the plugin do the rest. Customize your layout with options to adjust width or height in case of overflow, and choose between vertical or horizontal grid arrangements. Perfect for generating multiple cards quickly and efficiently, this plugin ensures your designs stay organized and visually appealing. Ideal for designers looking to streamline their workflow and produce consistent, high-quality card designs.


simply speaking this plugin will create replicas of your selected design (prototype) with the new data separated by newline.


current limitation is it is only work with single row of text. it can only change texts
plugins.tagline: String to Card Generator

plugins.name: DESY
plugins.description:
DESY is your Figma companion, designed for seamless design workflow. It ensures design system compliance, exports clean CSS code, and suggests style guides for a cohesive brand identity.


Design System Compliance

Effortlessly integrate design with development by cross-checking elements against your style guide. Instantly identify and highlight deviations, streamlining design-to-development handoff.


Export CSS

Generate exportable CSS code based on your style library. Consolidate styles into a single stylesheet for consistent updates, simplifying design system edits with auto-generated CSS snippets.


Styleguide Suggestions

Receive intelligent style guide suggestions based on your design file. Enhance your library with curated elements, jumpstarting a well-organized and consistent brand identity.


Why Choose DESY

Enhance collaboration, boost efficiency, and elevate brand consistency with DESY – the ultimate Figma tool for design system management, CSS export, and style guide refinement.
plugins.tagline: Keep your designs, identify styling issues, and streamline the handoff process with DESY

plugins.name: Blobs Generator - Create Dynamic and Customizable Blobs
plugins.description:
🎨 Blobs Generator Plugin: Effortlessly create unique and dynamic shapes for your designs!


How to use:


  1. Select a Style: Choose from styles like Organic, Smooth, Spiky, and more.
  2. Adjust Colors: Opt for solid or gradient fill and pick your favorite colors.
  3. Customize the Shape: Use sliders to tweak complexity and uniqueness.
  4. Real-Time Preview: Instantly see changes in the preview.
  5. Create and Save: Click 'Create Blob' to generate and save your creation in history.
  6. Explore and Restore: Browse history to revisit and restore previous blobs.



✨ Tip: Use the 'Randomize' button for surprising and inspiring shapes!


With Blob Generator, bring your creations to life quickly and enjoyably! 🚀"

plugins.name: Layer Manager
plugins.description:
Layer Manager is designed to improve your workflow by providing quick access to important layer management functions. 


This plugin focuses on three primary operations: listing layers, controlling layer visibility, and renaming layers. 


Getting Started

  1. Open your Figma design file.
  2. Select the layers or frames you want to manage.
  3. Search for the Layer Manager plugin from the Figma plugin menu.
  4. Launch the plugin. 


Basic Operations

Viewing Layers:

After launching the plugin with your desired layers or frames selected, you'll see a list of all the layers within your selection.


Toggling Layer Visibility

Individual Layers:

  1. Find the layer you want to toggle in the list.
  2. Click the visibility icon next to the layer name to show or hide it.
  3. The change will be immediately reflected in your Figma design.

All Layers:

  1. Use the "Hide all" button to hide all layers in the list at once.
  2. Use the "Show all" button to make all layers in the list visible.


Renaming Layers:

  1. Locate the layer you want to rename in the list.
  2. Click on the layer name to enter edit mode.
  3. Type the new name for the layer.
  4. Press Enter or click outside the input field to confirm the new name.


Refreshing the Layer List:

If you make changes to your selection in the Figma file while the plugin is open:

  1. Click the "Refresh layers" button in the plugin interface.
  2. The layer list will update to reflect your current selection in the Figma document.


Searching Layers:

  1. Click on the search bar at the top of the layer list in the plugin interface and type in your search term. This could be: a layer name or a layer type (e.g., "rectangle," "text," or "group").
  2. As you type, the layer list would dynamically update to show only the layers that match your search criteria.
  3. To clear the search and see all layers again, simply delete your search term.


Tips for Efficient Use

  1. Start with a focused selection in your Figma file to manage specific groups of layers more effectively.
  2. Use the bulk hide/show actions to quickly toggle visibility for comparing different versions of your design.
  3. Regularly refresh the layer list if you're making changes in your Figma file while the plugin is open.
  4. Rename layers directly from the plugin to maintain consistent naming conventions without switching contexts.
plugins.tagline: A better way to view, hide, and rename your design layers.

plugins.name: Embedded Wizard Connect for Figma
plugins.description:
Export Figma Designs to Embedded Wizard Studio

Embedded Wizard Connect for Figma simplifies the workflow between designers and embedded developers. Instead of recreating designs from scratch in Embedded Wizard Studio, you can now start with GUI layouts from Figma and bring the design to life more quickly.


Benefits:

-Template-free flexibility: Designers can work freely in Figma without being restricted to rigid templates.

-Simplified Workflow: Embedded Wizard converts Figma designs into implementable code suited for embedded systems, eliminating manual efforts and reducing development time.

-Uncomplicated Design Updates: Save time by reimporting updated Figma Designs with just a few clicks


Getting started:

Check out the full documentation for best practices

Get to know Embedded Wizard on our website.


About Embedded Wizard:

Embedded Wizard is TARA Systems’ award-winning solution for developing embedded graphical user interfaces (GUIs).

accepted.name: TARA Systems GmbH
accepted.description: TARA Systems is an independent software company. Embedded Wizard is its award-winning solution for creating graphical user interfaces for embedded systems.

plugins.tagline: Bring your creativity pixel prefect to your embedded device

plugins.name: Token Code -  (Css, Tailwind, Typescript, Shopify, Swift, Android)
plugins.description:
This app takes your Figma design tokens, such as color, typography, effect, and spacing, and generates code outputs in over 10 different formats, including CSS, SCSS, Tailwind, TypeScript, Shopify Liquid, Swift, and more. Additionally, it allows you to export Local Styles definitions as CSS. Designed to streamline your design-to-code workflow, it’s an essential tool for designers and developers alike.


How Does It Work?

1.Select either Local Variables or Local Styles to begin.

2.Choose the tokens you want to generate code for.

3.Pick your desired output format (e.g., CSS, Tailwind).

4.Hit the Copy button to get your code.


That’s it! Transforming your tokens into ready-to-use code is now just a few clicks away.


Additional Highlights

•User-Friendly: The simple interface makes it easy for anyone to use, regardless of their experience level.

•Broad Format Support: With over 10 output formats, it seamlessly integrates into any workflow or technology stack.

•Time-Saving: Quickly bridge the gap between design and development, saving you hours of manual work.


This app is the perfect bridge between design and code. Take your design tokens to development with just one click and supercharge your workflow! 🚀



This app is completely free! It’s designed to make your workflow faster and easier. If you find it helpful, feel free to leave a review, like, or share it with others.

If you encounter any issues, you can reach out to me directly via X ❤️
plugins.tagline: Turn Your Design Tokens into Ready-to-Use Code Across 10+ Formats with One Click!

114538.release_notes:
We’re excited to announce the latest update to our Figma plugin! Here’s what’s new:

• Support for Variable Usage: You can now seamlessly use variables within the Local Variables section, making your workflow even more efficient.

• Collection Variable Model: We’ve added support for the Collection Variable Model, allowing you to group and manage variables more effectively.

plugins.name: Figscreen - Screenshot Websites
plugins.description:
Figscreen – Website Screenshots in Figma


Figscreen is a Figma plugin that lets you import website screenshots directly into your canvas. It’s a tool built to simplify the process of collecting and organizing web references.


Features

  1. Bulk Import: Capture up to 25 websites at once
  2. High-Quality Screenshots: Supports Retina resolution
  3. Custom Sizes: Choose from preset device sizes or set custom dimensions (320px to 1920px)
  4. Auto Layout: Screenshots are arranged and labelled on the canvas
  5. Full-Page Support: Captures entire web pages, including lazy-loaded sections
  6. Responsive Views: Capture desktop, tablet, and mobile layouts


How to Use

  1. Paste one or more URLs (must include “https://”)
  2. Choose device types or set custom dimensions
  3. Click “Import Screenshots”
  4. Screenshots will appear on your canvas, organized and ready to use


Notes

  1. Works with public websites (no login required)
  2. Captures full pages, including dynamic content
  3. Upcoming features: option to hide banners, pop-ups, and chat widgets


If you have any questions, contact: support@figscreen.com

Found a bug? Report it here: figscreen.com/feedback
plugins.tagline: Capture, Import, Display – Up to 25 Sites at Once

  2. High-Quality Screenshots: Supports Retina resolution
  3. Custom Sizes: Choose from preset device sizes or set custom dimensions (320px to 1920px)

  5. Full-Page Support: Captures entire web pages, including lazy-loaded sections

132883.tagline: Capture, Import, Display – Up to 25 Sites at Once

plugins.name: Word-Char Counter
plugins.description:
Word-Char Counter is a handy, one-click plugin that makes counting words and characters a breeze! Whether you’re working with a quick sentence, a detailed paragraph, or a full-blown essay, this plugin gives you instant stats on your text.


It's designed for anyone who needs to keep an eye on text length—perfect for designers crafting layouts or writers polishing their drafts. Just select your text, click the plugin, and voilà! You get real-time stats of word count and character count displayed right in your Figma files for reference.


Happy writing :)
plugins.tagline: Counts the no. of words and characters in your text layers.

plugins.name: Mirucode - Frontend With AI
plugins.description:
Mirucode generates HTML and CSS from Figma designs. By having AI come up with appropriate class names, it provides highly maintainable CSS.


It offers the following features:


  1. Generate HTML and CSS without using AI
  2. AI generates class names and produces highly maintainable HTML and CSS
  3. Instruct the AI to freely modify the generated HTML and CSS
  4. Display the CSS of the selected element
  5. Display the distance between selected elements
  6. Flexible responsive support


Mirucode is a next-generation revolutionary plugin that accelerates front-end development tenfold.

plugins.name: Variables → Text Styles
plugins.description:
Easily Apply Variables to Your Text Styles

Tired of manually assigning variables to text styles? Variables to Text Styles plugin lets you streamline this process by syncing your variables to existing text styles.


How It Works

You'll need existing text styles and typography variables ready to go, then follow these steps:


  1. Create text objects
  2. Apply variables to the text layers' properties
  3. Name the text layers to match their corresponding text style. If your styles are in folders, include the full path using '/' (e.g., folder/subfolder/style)
  4. Run the plugin
  5. Select your text layers. If you make changes, you'll need to reselect them.
  6. Click "Update Text Styles" to apply the variables


Important Notes

  1. If you modify your text properties while the plugin is open, reselect them to refresh the updates.
  2. This plugin does not convert text layers into styles, allowing you to continue making adjustments.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Sync variables with your text styles.

131969.name: Variables → Text Styles
131969.description:

  3. Name the text layers to match their corresponding text style. If your styles are in folders, include the full path using '/' (e.g., folder/subfolder/style)
  4. Run the plugin
  5. Select your text layers. If you make changes, you'll need to reselect them.

  2. This plugin does not convert text layers into styles, allowing you to continue making adjustments.
131969.tagline: Sync variables with your text styles.

plugins.name: Multi-Link Copy
plugins.description:
Multi-Link Copy


Multi-Link Copy is designed to streamline the process of copying multiple frame or component links at once. If you're working on a large-scale design project, you may need to share or document the locations of multiple frames or components within a your file.


Instead of manually copying each link one by one, this plugin allows you to select multiple components or frames and generate their links in bulk. The links are copied to your clipboard in separate lines, making it easy to paste them into a spreadsheet, text file, or any document where you need to store or share those links.


What the Plugin Does:


Batch Copying of Links:

  1. The plugin generates URLs for selected components or frames within the current Figma file.
  2. Each link is a direct reference to the specific node (frame or component) inside the Figma file.
  3. These links are copied to your clipboard and can be pasted into any document, where each URL will appear on its own line in the order of your layer hierarchy in your Figma file (top layers first).


Use Case:

  1. When you need to share links to multiple frames or components in one go, especially for documentation, design reviews, developer hand-offs, or tracking design updates.
  2. Useful for project managers, designers, and developers who need quick access to the location of specific elements within a Figma file.


---


How to Use the Plugin:


1. Enter Figma File URL

  1. After launching the plugin, you will be prompted to enter the URL of your Figma file.
  2. This is required to extract the file key that’s necessary for generating URLs for the selected frames or components.
  3. This data is used temporarily by the plugin and never saved, read, or accessed by anyone.
  4. To get the URL, open the Figma file in your browser and copy the link from the address bar. It should look something like: https://www.figma.com/file/{fileKey}/Your-File-Name.


2. Selecting Elements

  1. Select the components, frames, or any other nodes you want to generate links for.


3. Copy Links

  1. Click "Copy Links" and a notification will appear confirming how many links were copied.
  2. The links are already copied to your clipboard, formatted one per line.


4. Paste Links

  1. Go to any document where you want to paste the links (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets, Notion, Slack, etc.).
  2. Each link will populate a new line or row in the document in the order of your layers in Figma (top layers first).


5. Celebrate 🎉


---


What You Can Expect:


Fast Bulk Link Generation: Select as many frames or components as needed, and the plugin will generate URLs for all selected items instantly.


Easy Copy and Paste: Once the plugin runs, the links are automatically copied to the clipboard. You don’t need to open a separate window or click additional buttons. Simply paste the links wherever needed.


---


Example Output


After running the plugin, if you've selected 3 components, pasting into a document will give something like this:


https://www.figma.com/file/{fileKey}/?node-id=123:456

https://www.figma.com/file/{fileKey}/?node-id=789:1011

https://www.figma.com/file/{fileKey}/?node-id=112:1314


Each URL points directly to the specific frame or component within the Figma file.


---


Limitations:


The plugin needs the Figma file URL to extract the fileKey, which is a unique identifier for your Figma file. The fileKey allows it to accurately generate direct links to the frames or components you select.


The URL is only used temporarily to retrieve this key, ensuring privacy and security. The plugin does not store any information. Keep in mind, only users with access to your files can view or use the generated links.


About fileKeys: A fileKey is part of the URL that uniquely identifies each Figma file. It's essential for referencing the correct file when generating links for components or frames. To understand more about how fileKeys work and where they are located in your Figma URL, you can visit Figma's documentation here.
plugins.tagline: Batch copy mutliple frame links at a time

To understand more about how fileKeys work and where they are located in your Figma URL, you can visit Figma's documentation here.
104295.release_notes: Enhanced Layer Order Handling: The plugin now respects the full layer hierarchy, including nested layers. Links are copied in the same order as they appear in the Figma layers panel, ensuring both top-level and child layers are accurately represented.

plugins.name: RealSize Plugin
plugins.description:
RealScale is a Figma plugin that allows designers to view their designs at real-world size directly on the canvas. It automatically scales the viewport based on the PPI (pixels per inch) of your display, giving you an accurate representation of how your designs will appear on real devices. Simply install the plugin, select a layer and run the plugin.


How to use:

  1. Select a layer
  2. Activate the RealScale plugin.
  3. Enter the display details (resolution and screen size).
  4. Enter the target display details.
  5. Enjoy viewing your design in true-to-life dimensions!


Note: No subscription required.

accepted.name: Fail Fast
accepted.description: Digital experience design studio with +90 creatives. Embracing fearless innovation, we ideate, prototype, test, and learn without fear of failing.

plugins.tagline: Scale your designs to real size instantly.

plugins.name: WCAG Line Length
plugins.description:
Make your text more accessible with automatic line length optimization.


This plugin helps you comply with WCAG 2.2 Success Criterion 1.4.8, which recommends limiting line lengths to 80 characters or less. Long lines of text can be difficult to read and navigate, especially for users with cognitive disabilities or visual impairments.


📐 Key features:

  1. Check text elements against WCAG guidelines
  2. Automatically fix line lengths by adding strategic line breaks
  3. Works with any text layer or text box
  4. Supports multiple text selections
  5. Preserves your original text styling


💬 How to use:

  1. Select any text layers you want to check
  2. Click "Check Selection" to identify issues
  3. Click "Fix" to automatically adjust line lengths


Perfect for:

  1. UX/UI designers
  2. Accessibility specialists
  3. Content designers
  4. Anyone creating accessible digital experiences


Stay compliant with accessibility standards while maintaining clean, readable designs.
plugins.tagline: "Make your designs accessible by optimizing text line lengths to WCAG standards"

plugins.name: Nong’s Handoff Tools
plugins.description:
Usage:

  1. Connect Pages: Select two Frames that need to be linked. In the plugin panel, choose the direction for the outgoing lines of the two Frames, then click the “Link” button to create the connection.
  2. Add Text Annotations: Select the element that needs an annotation. Click the button in the plugin panel to generate a number and text annotation.
  3. Draw Flowchart: Click the button to generate an element individually. Alternatively, select an existing element and then click the button to connect it to the selected element.
  4. Change Background Color: Click the “Page” button to change the color of the page. Select a Section and click the “Section” button to change the Section’s color. Click the “Area” button to directly generate a Frame for a separate Area.



使用方式：

  1. 连接页面：选择两个需要连线的Frame，在插件面板上选择两个Frame 出线的方向，点击Link按钮，即可连线。
  2. 添加文字备注：选择需要备注的元素，在插件面板上点击按钮，即可生成序号和文字。
  3. 绘制流程图：单独点击按钮可单独生成元素。也可先选择某个元素，再点击按钮，则会连接到选择的元素上。
  4. 背景色更改：直接点击Page按钮会更改Page的颜色。选择Section，点击Section按钮，则会修改Section颜色。点击Area按钮，会直接生成一个单独Area的Frame。
plugins.tagline: Connect & Description & Flow & Background

126702.name: Nong’s Handoff Tools
126702.description:
Usage:

  1. Connect Pages: Select two Frames that need to be linked. In the plugin panel, choose the direction for the outgoing lines of the two Frames, then click the “Link” button to create the connection.
  2. Add Text Annotations: Select the element that needs an annotation. Click the button in the plugin panel to generate a number and text annotation.
  3. Draw Flowchart: Click the button to generate an element individually. Alternatively, select an existing element and then click the button to connect it to the selected element.
  4. Change Background Color: Click the “Page” button to change the color of the page. Select a Section and click the “Section” button to change the Section’s color. Click the “Area” button to directly generate a Frame for a separate Area.



使用方式：

  1. 连接页面：选择两个需要连线的Frame，在插件面板上选择两个Frame 出线的方向，点击Link按钮，即可连线。
  2. 添加文字备注：选择需要备注的元素，在插件面板上点击按钮，即可生成序号和文字。
  3. 绘制流程图：单独点击按钮可单独生成元素。也可先选择某个元素，再点击按钮，则会连接到选择的元素上。
  4. 背景色更改：直接点击Page按钮会更改Page的颜色。选择Section，点击Section按钮，则会修改Section颜色。点击Area按钮，会直接生成一个单独Area的Frame。
126702.release_notes: 修复了双侧箭头的问题

plugins.name: Interactive Input Fields & Form Prototyping with MagicInput
plugins.description:
Turn any static design into a fully interactive, keyboard-driven prototype, without writing a single line of code

---

MagicInput automates the creation of input fields in your Figma prototypes by:


  1. 🔁 Cloning a base input component or instance
  2. 🔗 Binding values to Figma Variables (value, length, placeholder visibility)
  3. ⌨️ Adding keypress-based reactions for typing, backspace, and more
  4. 🎯 Enabling click-to-focus behavior
  5. 🚀 Generating full keyboard logic with conditional visibility
  6. 🧼 Cleaning up unused variables automatically

---

Whether you're building forms, authentication flows, or search UIs, MagicInput helps simulate realistic input behavior, directly inside Figma.

- Supports:

a–z, A–Z, 0–9, space, backspace, escape, and special characters (!@#$%^&*()_+, etc.)

Perfect for:

  1. UX demos with real input behavior
  2. Usability testing without dev handoff
  3. Interactive form mockups
  4. Keyboard-driven prototype logic


Skip the click-through illusion. Make your inputs feel real.


Try it on your design now and start building smarter Figma prototypes with true input interactivity.


🚧 Beta Disclaimer

We're actively improving MagicInput—some features may still be buggy.

Help us make it better by reporting issues at feedback-form.

accepted.name: Jovan
accepted.description:
prod designer crafting intuitive, scalable, human‑first products. Structured, hands‑on maker untangling complexity. 
---

plugins.tagline: Bring realistic typing, validation & responsive input components to your Figma prototypes

plugins.name: Mattarello - Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
🛠 Imagine your design process as a bustling marketplace, where ideas are traded, and creativity flows like the spices in a bazaar. In this vibrant scene, your designs are like unique ingredients, ready to be mixed into the grand recipe of your project. But transferring these ingredients from the market stall (Figma) to your cooking station (GitHub or other servers) can often feel like navigating through a crowded square, balancing pots and pans filled with precious spices.


🔌 Introducing Mattarello, the magic carpet that effortlessly carries your Figma variables across the digital divide in a swift, seamless flight. This Figma plugin is your culinary assistant, meticulously organizing your spices (design tokens) into neat jars (JSON format), ready to be shelved directly into your pantry (GitHub or other servers), automating your workflow as if by magic.


👨‍🍳 Embrace the future of design-cooking with our plugin, and let your creative dishes be seasoned to perfection with the efficiency and harmony of automated spice delivery. Your design kitchen will never be the same, as you find more time to taste, experiment, and refine your creations to Michelin-star standards.


—————


💬 If you notice anything that doesn't seem accurate or could be improved, please reach out to me — I'd be delighted to have a conversation about it.


—————


With love and coffee, kkratter ❤️
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma to Github

Mongolian Brothers.


Нэмэлт сайжруулалт хүсэлтийн тухай коммент хэсэгт үлдээгээрэй. 😎


Хялбар аргаар текст болон өгүүлбэр үүсгэгч.


Ашиглах заавар:

  1. Text layer сонго
  2. Plugin ажлуулаад хүсэж буй өгөгдлөө сонгоорой.


Удахгүй нэмэгдэх өөрчлөлтүүд:

  1. Өгүүлбэр / Нэмэгдэв /
  2. Байгуулагын лого. / Санал асуулга авна. /
plugins.tagline: Монгол үг болон өгүүлбэр үүсгэгч.

plugins.name: Convert to ICO
plugins.description:
Convert to Ico is a simple yet powerful Figma plugin that helps designers and developers easily transform any Figma element into Windows ICO icon files.


Key Features:

• Convert any Frame, Group, or Image to ICO format

• Multiple preset size options (16px, 32px, 48px, 64px, 128px)

• Real-time preview functionality

• Clean and intuitive interface

• Quick one-click export


Whether you're designing Windows application icons, website favicons, or working on any project that requires ICO format, Convert to Ico streamlines your workflow with its efficient conversion process.
plugins.tagline: Convert any Figma design to ICO icons in one click

125328.name: Convert to ICO

125328.tagline: Convert any Figma design to ICO icons in one click

plugins.name: Knak - Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
Turn Figma Designs into Production-Ready HTML—In Seconds


The Knak - Figma Plugin helps Marketing Designers bring their Figma designs into Knak and turn them into fully editable emails—without having to start from scratch. Instead of manually rebuilding designs, you can import them directly into Knak, refine the details, and create reusable modules and themes that fit into your workflows.


With this plugin, you can:

✅ Speed up Design-to-Production Workflow

✅ Transform Figma designs into Knak HTML in seconds—no manual handoffs, no back-and-forth.

✅ Keep Designers in Figma

✅ Let designers stay in the tool they love while keeping every email on-brand. Push designs to Knak with one click, ensuring a smooth handoff that preserves brand guidelines and creative integrity.

✅ Make it easier for Marketing Operations to review and finalize designs.


How it works


1 - Design in Figma

  1. Create email layouts using the Knak - Figma Plugin.

2 - Sync to Knak

  1. Push designs directly into Knak’s no-code builder with a single click.

3 - Refine & Launch

  1. Fine-tune, personalize, and translate in Knak, then send directly to your marketing automation platform.


Read the step-by-step guide here.


Need help? Visit our help centre.

accepted.name: Knak
accepted.description: Knak is a no-code campaign creation platform, enabling users to design, collaborate, and deploy emails & landing pages with ease.

plugins.tagline: Move your Figma designs into Knak and get emails across the finish line, fast.

plugins.name: CHEAT SHEET
plugins.description: Cheat Sheet is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your design process. It offers a comprehensive library of UX, UI, and research methods, all presented in a concise and easy-to-understand format. Whether you're brainstorming, designing, or conducting research, Cheat Sheet is your go-to resource for making informed decisions without leaving your workflow. Perfect for designers of all levels!
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin offering UX, UI, and research methods, making design decisions quick and effortless.

plugins.name: Token Exporter
plugins.description:
Easily export your local variable collections from Figma into clean, developer-ready JSON files.

Perfect for sharing design tokens such as colors, spacing, typography, and more with developers.


✅ Supports multiple collections

✅ Converts collection names into safe, kebab-case JSON filenames

✅ Zips all exported files into a single downloadable .zip

✅ Compatible with both Design and Dev Mode
plugins.tagline: Share Tokens/Collection to the Developers in JSON format

plugins.name: CSS Color Extrator
plugins.description:
CSS Color Extractor

CSS Color Extractor es una herramienta intuitiva que te permite extraer todos los colores CSS utilizados en cualquier sitio web con solo ingresar la URL. Simplifica el proceso de recoger y reutilizar colores de otros sitios para tus proyectos, ya sea que necesites inspiración de una paleta ya existente o simplemente quieras analizar los tonos usados en una página.


Características Principales:

  1. Extracción Rápida desde una URL: Introduce la URL de cualquier sitio web y extrae todos los colores CSS utilizados, incluyendo variables declaradas en en el root.
  2. Copiado Manual: También puedes pegar manualmente las declaraciones CSS del inspector de tu navegador para obtener los colores.
  3. Identificación y Copiado Fácil: Copia los valores hexadecimales o las variables CSS con un solo clic.
  4. Interfaz Amigable: Diseñada con una interfaz limpia y amigable que hace que la experiencia sea intuitiva y eficiente.
  5. Ideal para Diseñadores y Desarrolladores: Si buscas una forma rápida de identificar paletas de colores en la web, CSS Color Extractor es perfecto para ayudarte a ahorrar tiempo.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Ingresa la URL de la página web de la cual deseas extraer los colores, o copia y pega las declaraciones CSS.
  2. Presiona el botón "EXTRAER COLORES" y obtén todos los colores utilizados.
  3. Selecciona cualquier color para ver su código hex o nombre de variable CSS, y cópialo fácilmente al portapapeles.
plugins.tagline: Extrae la paleta de colores de un sitio web

plugins.name: Name by Layers
plugins.description: This tool provides a convenient way to rename frames, groups, components, or instances based on the names of their nested elements. It allows you to select one or multiple containers and apply a desired naming convention. The plugin will then automatically rename the selected containers using the names of their child elements.
plugins.tagline: Rename containers based on their nested elements and the chosen convention
